install.name: Announcements
install.author: JXtended, LLC
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2008 JXtended, LLC. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module allows the displaying of a syndicated feed with parameterized layouts

param.name: max_words
param.label: Maximum Words
param.description: Maximum number of words to display for each item.

param.name: show_thumb
param.label: Show Thumbnails
param.description: Show thumbnails for items where possible.

param.name: auto_thumbnail
param.label: Autogenerate Thumbnails
param.description: Use GD to autogenerate thumbnail images where possible.

param.name: thumb_align
param.label: Thumbnail Alignment
param.description: The image alignment for the thumbnail images.

param.name: cat_ids
param.label: Show for Categories
param.description: Choose which categories for which comments will display.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
